page.syntax: Context.Response.SendFile as V (Filename as C, PromptToSave as L = .F., OutputFilename as C = "__not__specified__")

argument.name: Filename as C
argument.description: The name of the file to written to the response's output.

argument.name: PromptToSave as L
argument.description: Optional. Add the Content-Disposition header to the client will prompt for save. This defaults to .F. when an OutputFilename is not specified. It defaults to .T. when an OutputFilename is specified.

argument.name: OutputFilename as C
argument.description: lts to .T.Optional. The name the client should use when saving the file.

page.description: Write the content of a file to output stream
page.discussion: Context.Response.SaveFile() Write the content of a file directly to the response's output stream.
